articles.content: Despite being over a year old, the Samsung Galaxy A53 is still one of the best mid-range phones on the market. It packs a stunning OLED display, a decent camera system, and a battery that lasts up to… [+2216 chars]

articles.title: Realme launches Narzo 60x 5G; price, charging, camera, battery, chip, rivals and more - HT Tech
articles.description: Realme unveils the budget-friendly Realme Narzo 60x 5G in India, featuring fast charging and impressive camera capabilities. Check out the details!
